meanings.definition: Amtraks (noun): The name of a passenger railroad service in the United States.
meanings.sent1: I took the amtraks to visit my grandma in another city.
meanings.sent2: The amtraks arrived at the station right on time.
meanings.sent3: The amtraks conductor told a funny joke over the intercom.
meanings.sent4: The amtraks of tourists flooded the platform, eager to explore the city.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the amtraks whistle echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: Amtraks (verb): To travel by Amtrak train.
meanings.sent1: We decided to amtraks to New York for the weekend.
meanings.sent2: She amtraks regularly for work meetings.
meanings.sent3: I amtraksed to the concert and had a great time.
meanings.sent4: His dreams amtraksed through landscapes of adventure and discovery.
meanings.sent5: The idea of amtraksing across the country excited her beyond words.
